info.title: Yuno Payments API
info.description: Yuno payment orchestration API for processing payments across Latin America

post.description: Creates a new checkout session to initialize a payment flow. Returns HTTP 200 (not 201).

get.description: Retrieves the details of an existing checkout session.

parameters.name: checkout_session_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the checkout session

post.description: Creates a new payment using a checkout session.

get.description: Returns a list of payments. Supports pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination

get.description: Retrieves the details of an existing payment.

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment to capture

post.description: Cancels a pending or authorized payment.

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment to cancel

post.description: Creates a refund for a completed payment. Supports partial refunds.

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment to refund

amount.description: Refund amount. Omit for full refund.

get.description: Returns all installment plans configured for the account.

post.description: Creates a new installment plan for the account.

get.description: Retrieves a specific installment plan by ID.

parameters.name: installments_plan_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the installment plan

parameters.name: installments_plan_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the installment plan

parameters.name: installments_plan_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the installment plan

get.description: Returns a list of issuers (banks) available for a given country. Note: This endpoint returns HTTP 201 (unusual for GET requests, but confirmed behavior).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

201.description: List of issuers for the specified country

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer

post.description: Creates a new payout to send funds to a recipient.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a payout by ID. Note: The path `/v1/payouts/merchant-ref/{reference}` may require a UUID format for the reference parameter â€” verify the correct format for your use case.

parameters.name: payout_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payout

post.description: Generates a new report for the specified date range.

get.description: Retrieves the status and details of a generated report.

parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the report

get.description: Returns a list of payout recipients. Requires `merchant_recipient_id` query parameter.

parameters.name: merchant_recipient_id
parameters.description: The merchant-assigned recipient identifier to filter by

parameters.description: Maximum number of results

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination

parameters.name: recipient_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the recipient

publicApiKey.name: public-api-key
publicApiKey.description: Your public API key from the Yuno Dashboard

accountCode.name: account-code
accountCode.description: Your account identifier. The alias X-Account-Code is also accepted.

document_number.description: Document number (digits only). CPF: 11 digits, CNPJ: 14 digits.

payment_methods.description: Available payment methods for this session

checkout_session.description: The checkout session ID from the create session response

token.description: Payment method token (for tokenized card payments)

vaulted_token.description: Vaulted payment method token (for returning customers)

account_id.description: Account IDs this plan applies to

installments_plan.description: Array of installment options with rates

first_installment_deferral.description: Number of periods before first installment

recipient_id.description: The recipient to send funds to

purpose.description: Purpose of the payout (see Purposes reference list)

from.description: Start date in ISO 8601 datetime format

to.description: End date in ISO 8601 datetime format

date_range.description: Date range for the report. Must use datetime format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'), not date-only format.

download_url.description: URL to download the completed report
